biography: Matti, a golfer of considerable experience, is known for his calm and collected demeanor on the course. While his home club remains a mystery, his presence has certainly been felt at past Hector Trophée events.

With two appearances at the Hector Trophée, Matti has demonstrated a commitment to the tournament. While victory has eluded him thus far, his participation has undoubtedly added to the competitive spirit of the event. Although Matti has not yet secured either a Hector Trophée or Victor Trophy, his contributions to the sport are noteworthy.

Currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, Matti will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, golf enthusiasts know that anything is possible and a last-minute change to the field always remains a possibility.
